Acid Immunity
You have become an alpha. Your attacks ignore immunity to critical hits and your critical threats are also automatically confirmed.
Alpha Strike

Every time you cast a spell, it becomes extended, as though using the Extend Spell feat.
Every time you cast a spell, it becomes maximized, as though using the Maximize Spell feat.

Every time you cast a spell, it becomes maximized, as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
Every time you cast a spell, it becomes quickened, as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Every time you cast a spell, it becomes quickened, as though using the Quicken Spell feat.

Every time you cast a spell, it becomes quickened, as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Every time you cast a spell, it increases its range by one range category, as though using the Reach Spell feat.
Every time you cast a spell, it increases its range by one range category, as though using the Reach Spell feat.
Overpowered Ability — Auto Reach
Every time you cast a spell, it increases its range by one range category, as though using the Reach Spell feat.

The Highschool Student gains a +1 bonus to all attributes.
If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.
Highschool Student

The Martial Artist is proficient with all exotic weapons.
If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.
Martial Artist

The Salaryman adds Perception to the list of her class skills. She can also use her Charisma instead of Wisdom while attempting Perception checks.
If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.
Salaryman

The Tabletop RPG Player adds Lore (Nature), Lore (Religion), Knowledge (World) and Knowledge (Arcana) to the list of her class skills and can use her Charisma instead of Intelligence or Wisdom while attempting Knowledge (World), Knowledge (Arcana), Lore (Religion), or Lore (Nature) checks.
If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.
Tabletop RPG Player
At 12th level, you and your companions take a short intermission beside a large body of water. During this time, you begin a journey of self discovery.
Beach Episode
You get an additional attack per round but take a –4 penalty to damage rolls.
Beta Strike
After extensive strengthening of your body, you gain DR/— equal to 10 + your character level.
Body Strengthening
As you increase your level, you can select powerful character development feats.
Character Development I

Cold Immunity

Dark Aura
At 10th level, enemies within 40 feet take a –2 penalty on attack rolls, AC, and saving throws.
As a standard action, you gain 1 million gold.
Overpowered Ability — Dupe Gold
As a standard action, you gain 1 million gold.

After reincarnating into Golarion, some protagonists use their newfound abilities to look cool and stylish. Their attacks become flashy and myriad, moving so fast that side characters would be lucky to even see the afterimage.

After reincarnating into Golarion, some protagonists use their newfound abilities to look cool and stylish. Their attacks become flashy and myriad, moving so fast that side characters would be lucky to even see the afterimage.
Edge Lord
At 7th level, you gain an +20 insight bonus to your speed.
Very Fast Movement

The Edge Lord is proficient with all simple and martial weapons as well as light and medium armor. They can cast spells from this class while wearing armor without incurring the normal arcane spell failure chance, but they incur the normal arcane spell failure chance for arcane spells received from other classes.
Edge Lord Proficiencies
You gain immunity to Electricity.
Electricity Immunity
Your summoned creatures get a +100 bonus to maximum Hit Points and a +10 bonus to Attack, AC, and saving throws.
Your summoned creatures get a +100 bonus to maximum Hit Points and a +10 bonus to Attack, AC, and saving throws.
Exceptional Summoning
Your summoned creatures get a +100 bonus to maximum Hit Points and a +10 bonus to Attack, AC, and saving throws.
This creature gets a +100 bonus to maximum Hit Points and a +10 bonus to Attack, AC, and saving throws.
Exceptional Summon
You become proficient with all Exotic Weapons.
Exotic Weapon Proficiency

You gain additional attacks based on your level.
At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter (10th, 15th, and 20th level), you gain 1 additional attack.
Extra Strike
You gain a +100 insight bonus to your speed.
You gain a +100 insight bonus to your speed.
Extreme Speed
After extensive speed training, you gain a +100 insight bonus to your speed.
You gain immunity to Fire.
Fire Immunity
Enemies within 40 feet of the Isekai Protagonist take a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
Enemies within 40 feet of the Isekai Protagonist take a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
This creature has a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
Friendly Aura
At 9th level, enemies within 40 feet of the Isekai Protagonist take a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
Your attacks ignore concealment and are treated as adamantite for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
Gamma Strike
Allies within 40 feet of the God Emperor gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls and caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance.
Allies within 40 feet of the God Emperor gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls and caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance.
This character has a +2 bonus on attack rolls and caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance.
Glorious Aura
At 9th level, allies within 40 feet of the God Emperor gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls and caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance.

Rather than wandering aimlessly, collecting harems, or defeating demon lords, some protagonists decide to become gods. They sacrifice their character development feats and some sneak attack to gain auras which buff and debuff allies and enemies respectively.

Rather than wandering aimlessly, collecting harems, or defeating demon lords, some protagonists decide to become gods. They sacrifice their character development feats and some sneak attack to gain auras which buff and debuff allies and enemies respectively.
God Emperor

The God Emperor is proficient with all simple, martial, and exotic weapons and with all armor (heavy, light, and medium) and shields (including tower shields). They can cast spells from this class while wearing armor and shields (including tower shields) without incurring the normal arcane spell failure chance, but they incur the normal arcane spell failure chance for arcane spells received from other classes.
God Emperor Proficiences

At 20th level, you become a god. You gain 100 spell resistance and are immune to all physical damage. Your attacks ignore concealment, critical immunity, and damage reduction. Any critical threats you make are automatically confirmed. The spells you cast ignore spell resistance and spell immunity.
Godhood

At 15th level, the God Emperor gains immunity to sickening effects, nauseating effects, blindness, shaken effects, frightening effects, cowering, paralysis, petrification, confusion, sleep effects, slow effects, staggered effects, stun, daze, dazzle, entanglement, fatigue, exhaustion, movement impairing conditions, bleed, curses, hexes, posion, disease, fear effects, death effects, compulsion, charm, mind-affecting effects, emotion effects, ability score damage, energy drain, negative levels, sneak attack damage and critical hits.
Godly Vessel
Kills the targeted creature.
Overpowered Ability — Grasp Heart
You gain the Grasp Heart ability which can kill any creature in range.

As a free action, enemies within 60 feet who fails a DC 50 Will save loses any immunity to mind-affecting effects, charm effects, and compulsion effects, and becomes fascinated for 1d4 rounds. Creatures that succeed at this saving throw are immune to this ability for 24 hours.
1d4 rounds
Harem Magnet
Will negates
This creature is Fascinated and can take no actions. Any damage to the target automatically breaks the effect.
Fascinated

At 17th Level, you gain the ability to attract anyone. As a free action, enemies within 60 feet who fails a DC 50 Will save loses any immunity to mind-affecting effects, charm effects, and compulsion effects, and becomes fascinated for 1d4 rounds. Creatures that succeed at this saving throw are immune to this ability for 24 hours.
This creature is immune to Harem Magnet for 24 hours.
Harem Magnet Immunity
You gain immunity to bleed, blindness, curses, poison, disease, sickened, and nauseated conditions.
Healthy Body
You gain immunity to shaken, frightened, cowering, fear, death effects, ability score damage, energy drain, and negative levels.
Inner Power
Before you were hit by a truck, you were a...
Isekai
You gain the service of a familiar, which offers you some skill bonuses.
Familiar Selection
At 8th level, you gain a +10 bonus to your speed.
Fast Movement
At 3rd level, you count your class level as your fighter level for the purpose of qualifying for feats. If you have levels in fighter, these levels stack.
Fighter Training
At 1st level, you gain the service of either an animal companion or familiar, using your class level as your effective druid level.
Pet Selection
Isekai Protagonists gain twice as many feats as the other classes.
Isekai Protagonists gain twice as many feats as the other classes.
Bonus Feat
At 1st level, and at every even level thereafter, you gain a bonus feat in addition to those gained from normal advancement.
You can cast a number of cantrips, or 0-level spells. These spells are cast like any other spell, but they are not expended when cast and may be used again.
Cantrips

Isekai protagonists are people who have been reincarnated into the world of Golarion with overpowered abilities. As their story progresses, they gain more overpowered abilities to wreck every wannabe villain and side character they face.

Isekai protagonists are very powerful beings. They have plot armor which make them hard to kill, and have Overpowered Abilities which make them really powerful. They also gain character development feats which greatly enhance their combat power.
Isekai Protagonists gain an extremely Overpowered Ability at 1st level.
Overpowered Ability
Isekai Protagonists gain a luck bonus to AC and all saving throws equal to their character level.
Plot Armor

Isekai Protagonists are proficient with all simple and martial weapons and with all armor (heavy, light, and medium) and shields (including tower shields). They can cast spells from this class while wearing armor and shields (including tower shields) without incurring the normal arcane spell failure chance, but they incur the normal arcane spell failure chance for arcane spells received from other classes.
Isekai Protagonist Proficiences

Isekai protagonists are otherworldly entities who have been reincarnated into the world of Golarion with extraordinary abilities. As their story progresses, they gain more unexplained and overpowered abilities to overcome every challenge they face.

Most characters gain advantages when they flank an enemy, attack an enemy who can't see them or enjoy a similar fortunate position. Isekai Protagonists deal a tremendous amount of additional damage in such a situation.

Most characters gain advantages when they flank an enemy, attack an enemy who can't see them or enjoy a similar fortunate position. Isekai Protagonists deal a tremendous amount of additional damage in such a situation.
Sneak Attack
You can select a rogue talent from a limited set of rogue talents, ignoring any prerequisites for these talents.
Rogue Talents
At 15th level, you gain a competence bonus to your initiative checks equal to your Charisma modifier.
Quick-Footed
You gain immunity to dazed, dazzled, sleep, confusion, charm, emotion, complusion, and mind-affecting effects.
Master Self-Control
You emit a small aura of mundanity, giving you immunity to Sneak attack damage and critical hits.
Mundane Aura
At 3rd level, the God Emperor gains an inherent bonus to all attributes equal to 1/2 their character level.
Nascent Apotheosis
At 15th Level, you become immune to fatigue and exhaustion.
Otherworldly Stamina
You use your mythic powers to gain an additional Overpowered Ability.
Second Overpowered Ability
At 1st level, you get to select an extremely powerful Overpowered Ability.
You get to select an another extremely powerful Overpowered Ability.
Another Overpowered Ability
You always roll a 20 on all d20 rolls.
This character always rolls 20 on all d20 rolls.
Overpowered Ability — Perfect Roll
You always roll a 20 on all d20 rolls.
You gain a luck bonus to AC and all saving throws equal to your character level.
You gain a luck bonus to AC and all saving throws based on your character level.
Allies within 40 feet of the God Emperor take a +2 bonus on AC, and saving throws.
Allies within 40 feet of the God Emperor take a +2 bonus on AC, and saving throws.
This character has a +2 bonus on AC and saving throws.
Protective Aura
At 6th level, allies within 40 feet of the God Emperor take a +2 bonus on AC, and saving throws.

Once per day, when your HP drops to 0, you are restored to full HP, ability damage, and ability drain. You also gain a +10 profane bonus to all attributes and your size also increases by one size category for 24 hours.
You gain a +10 profane bonus to all attributes and your size increases by one size category for 24 hours.
Second Form
Second Form Trigger

At 20th level, you become a boss. Once per day, when your HP drops to 0, you are restored to full HP, ability damage, and ability drain. You also gain a +10 profane bonus to all attributes and your size also increases by one size category for 24 hours.
At 6th level, you gain a luck bonus to attack and damage rolls equal to 1/2 your character level.
Signature Attack
Enemies within 40 feet of the God Emperor take a –2 penalty on all attributes.
Enemies within 40 feet of the God Emperor take a –2 penalty on all attributes.
This creature has a –2 penalty on all attributes.
Siphoning Aura
At 12th level, enemies within 40 feet of the God Emperor take a –2 penalty on all attributes.
You gain immunity to Sonic.
Sonic Immunity
You gain spell resistance equal to 10 + twice your character level.
You gain spell resistance equal to 10 + twice your character level.
Spell Negation
After extensive studying of spells, you gain spell resistance equal to 10 + twice your character level.
The Edge Lord uses their Dexterity modifier for their melee attack and damage bonus instead of Strength.
Supersonic Combat
You gain immunity to stunned, staggered, slowed, entangled, petrified, paralysis, and movement impairing effects.
Tenacious
At 5th, 10th and 15th level, you train yourself intensely and gain insight into your own abilities.
Training Arc
After extensive training sessions, you gain a +8 insight bonus to all attributes.
Training Montage

Truck-kun is a menace of the streets, a killer that prowls the road before it smashes their victim so hard they get transported into another world. Many fear death brought by Truck-kun, but there are some who believe that their reincarnation will bring them into a harem paradise. Beware of the streets, and look at both sides of the road, or else you might be its latest victim.
Domains: Artifice, Destruction, Repose, Travel
Favoured Weapon: Heavy Shield Bash
Truck-kun

You are the true main character of this world. Your health cannot go below 1 HP.
Your attacks ignore damage reduction. The spells you cast ignore spell resistance and spell immunity.
True Main Character

After obtaining ungodly amounts of power, some protagonists become villains. They view the new world as theirs to play with, and the new inhabitants as theirs to torment. Villains seek to increase their power even further, often by establishing their own kingdom... or by setting up not-so-ethical research in joyous human farms.

The Villain is proficient with all simple, martial, and exotic weapons and with all armor (heavy, light, and medium) and shields (including tower shields). They can cast spells from this class while wearing armor and shields (including tower shields) without incurring the normal arcane spell failure chance, but they incur the normal arcane spell failure chance for arcane spells received from other classes.
Villain Proficiences
At 16th level, you gain a competence bonus to your initiative checks equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Villain
You celebrate your awesomeness (Does nothing).
Celebrate
You decide not to have any Overpowered Abilities after reincarnating into the new world.
Winner
